channel.title: The Fighter & The Kid
channel.itunes:author: FOX Sports
channel.description:
The Fighter & The Kid is a weekly podcast featuring UFC heavyweight Brendan Schaub, and actor/comedian Bryan Callen. It’s uncut and unedited and sometimes it’s just ridiculous.
Get The Fighter and The Kid 3D now: www.TFATK3D..com
channel.itunes:subtitle:
The Fighter & The Kid is a weekly podcast featuring UFC heavyweight Brendan Schaub, and actor/comedian Bryan Callen. It’s uncut and unedited and sometimes it’s just ridiculous.
Get The Fighter and The Kid 3D now: www.TFATK3D..com
channel.itunes:keywords: MMA, Mixed Martial Arts, UFC, Ultimate Fighting Championship, UFC Fight Night, Fight Night, UFC Event, Bryan Callen, Brendan Schaub, comedy, funny

item.title: Episode 147: Joe Schilling
item.itunes:subtitle: Glory Kickboxing and MMA veteran, Joe Schilling, joins Brendan and Bryan on The Fighter and The Kid to discuss his upcoming fight, his training with the Diaz brothers and much more.
